original_title: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
overview: Orphaned as a young child and adopted by a band of notorious thieves, now-grown Ali Baba sets out to avenge his fatherâ€™s murder, reclaim the royal throne, and rescue his beloved Amara from the iron fist of his treacherous enemy.
tagline: Wild nights of sheer delights! Burning days of bold adventure!
title: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
